edu.gatech.cs2340.trydent.animation

Class KeyframeAnimationBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.gatech.cs2340.trydent.animation.KeyframeAnimationBuilder

  • public class KeyframeAnimationBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder class used to construct KeyframeAnimations. This class should not be instantiated directly; use KeyframeAnimation.create().

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      KeyframeAnimationBuilder addKeyframe()
      Adds a new keyframe of zero duration at the current position, rotation, and scale.

      Adds a new keyframe at the current position, rotation, and scale.

      Builds and returns a KeyframeAnimation with the given keyframes.

      Shifts the current keyframe by the given translation.
      KeyframeAnimationBuilder rotateBy(double rotation)
      Rotates the current keyframe.
      KeyframeAnimationBuilder scaleBy(Scale scale)
      Scales the current keyframe.
      KeyframeAnimationBuilder setAnimationCircular(boolean circular)
      If true, this animation will be constructed so that it loops back to the beginning when it ends.
      KeyframeAnimationBuilder setInterpolation(Interpolation<BaseVector<?>> interpolation)
      Sets the interpolation strategy used to generate in-between frames.

      Sets the position, rotation, and scale of the current keyframe.

      Sets the rotation of the current keyframe.
      KeyframeAnimationBuilder setScale(Scale scale)
      Sets the scale of the current keyframe, with (1,1) being no scale.
      KeyframeAnimationBuilder setTotalDuration(double duration)
      Sets the duration for the /TOTAL/ animation, changing the duration of all individual keyframes that have been set so far to accomplish this.

      • setInterpolation

        public KeyframeAnimationBuilder setInterpolation(Interpolation<BaseVector<?>> interpolation)
        Sets the interpolation strategy used to generate in-between frames. This defaults to Interpolation.SMOOTH and for most uses will not need to be changed. (Advanced functionality)
        Parameters:
        interpolation - interpolationg strategy.
        Returns:
        the builder, for method chaining

      • addKeyframe

        public KeyframeAnimationBuilder addKeyframe(double duration)
        Adds a new keyframe at the current position, rotation, and scale.
        Parameters:
        duration - Time in seconds it should take for the animation to get from this keyframe to the one after it. For the final keyframe, this value is ignored, as the final keyframe has no duration.
        Returns:
        the builder, for method chaining

      • addKeyframe

        public KeyframeAnimationBuilder addKeyframe()
        Adds a new keyframe of zero duration at the current position, rotation, and scale.

        Unless this is the final keyframe in the animation, this call should be followed by a call to setTotalDuration(duration), which will automatically change the duration of this frame and other zero-duration frames to appropriately fill in the remaining time.

        Returns:
        the builder, for method chaining

      • setTotalDuration

        public KeyframeAnimationBuilder setTotalDuration(double duration)
        Sets the duration for the /TOTAL/ animation, changing the duration of all individual keyframes that have been set so far to accomplish this. If any keyframes have a negative or 0 duration, they will be used to fill in the gaps in time, and the other frames will be left alone.
        Parameters:
        duration - the desired duration for the total animation
        Returns:
        the builder, for method chaining

      • setAnimationCircular

        public KeyframeAnimationBuilder setAnimationCircular(boolean circular)
        If true, this animation will be constructed so that it loops back to the beginning when it ends.
        Parameters:
        circular - if true, the animation will loop.
        Returns:
        the builder, for method training

      • build

        public KeyframeAnimation build()
        Builds and returns a KeyframeAnimation with the given keyframes.
        Returns:
        the constructed KeyframeAnimation using the keyframes previously defined.
